main event: An observer reported seeing an object that appeared like a bright star with a tail, possibly an aircraft, near Corpus Christi, Texas.
interesting points: The object was observed for 20 minutes,The observer described the object as silver and the size of a pea,It left a bright but short trail,The object was thought to be illuminated by the sun,There was confusion with a bright star in the south as the possible identification.
sighted object: an object resembling a bright star with a tail
location: 20 Mi NW of Corpus Christi, Texas
witness description: T/Sgt. Kennedy, Detachment S4783, OCC Squadron, Corpus Christi, Texas
